Travel

enjoy your stay

Lay of the land

Our festivities will be held nestled in the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains, an area very special to us. Like many small mountain towns, there aren't many large hotels nearby but there are a lot of lovely Airbnb, VRBO and boutique hotel options.

We've provided a few hotel options below, as well as a Google Doc with vacation rental options. Please don't hestitate to reach out if you'd like us to help find the perfect spot for you to stay.

Parking & Transportation

Parking is not available at the venue but we have arranged shuttles to help with transportation.

Please park at the address below, just down the street from the wedding venue. Shuttles will be available to take you to and from the venue.

Shuttle Pickup / Dropoff Location

Lakemont Fire Station
91 Lakemont Circle
Lakemont, GA 30552

Shuttle Schedule

Keep an eye out for the finalized shuttle schedule (to be posted here) closer to the wedding day.

Vacation Homes

We've compiled a list of vacation homes on Airbnb, VRBO and other websites. We've vetted these (including seeing many of them in person) and made sure they were all conveniently located to the festivities.
